fields.request: Manual QA: Verify AWG energy tariff via nginx proxy
fields.request_details: Sign in to the console and open http://10.42.0.1:8000/awg/energy-tariff/. Confirm the Energy Tariff Calculator loads without a 404 while using the proxied port. Repeat with the backend port (http://10.42.0.1:8888/awg/energy-tariff/) to confirm both endpoints behave consistently, including calculator interactions after submitting a kWh value.
